pageSize

protected java.lang.Integer pageSize(ActionContext context)
This action will return the query page size. Returning null means the query is not paged, so, the query QueryParameters.ResultType will be QueryParameters.ResultType.ITERATOR. Otherwise, will be QueryParameters.ResultType.PAGE
